system.description: Effect: The user selects one other creature in range and transforms into the target species, copying the target's Base ATK, DEF, SPATK, SPDEF, and SPD stats. The user also copies the target's current Abilities and Active List, as well as any stage changes. The user remains transformed for 5 activations, or until they are switched out, combat ends, or are Fainted.

actions.name: Transform
actions.description: Effect: The user selects one other creature in range and transforms into the target species, copying the target's Base ATK, DEF, SPATK, SPDEF, and SPD stats. The user also copies the target's current Abilities and Active List, as well as any stage changes. The user remains transformed for 5 activations, or until they are switched out, combat ends, or are Fainted.
